title: WTB/ WTT for these five T207's

posts.post_title: WTB/ WTT for these five T207's
posts.post_content:
Hi all... looking to buy or trade for the following T207's. I have some T206 HOF portraits as trade bait too.

1. Ray Fisher (Blue Cap) SGC 40
2. Ray Fisher (White Cap) SGC 40
3. Chet Hoff (SGC 40) - tough
4. Jack Quinn (SGC 40)
5. Jack Warhop (SGC 40)

Let me know if you have any you're willing to part with. Will pay well.
